p: In the 270 μg/kg Rolontis group, severe neutropenia was reported in one patient (3%) and lasted 1 day (Table 2). In the lowest Rolontis dose group (45 μg/kg Rolontis), approximately one‐third of patients in (14 patients, 36%) experienced severe neutropenia that lasted between 1 and 5 days. In the 135 μg/kg Rolontis group, seven patients (19%) experienced severe neutropenia, which lasted for 1 to 2 days in six patients (17%) and 7 days in one patient, 3%). In the pegfilgrastim group, five patients (14%) experienced severe neutropenia that lasted for 1–3 days.
